tetra/schematic/single/gravedigger.name: Gravedigger
tetra/schematic/single/gravedigger.descr: Improves the combat capabilities of the shovel, addtionaly giving attacks a chance to stun entities, with better chances the deeper you are.
tetra/schematic/single/gravedigger_2.des: Hone the gravedigger improvement, increasing damage and stun time.
tetra/schematic/single/gravedigger_3.des: Further hone the gravedigger improvement, increasing damage and stun time.
tetra.improvement.single/gravedigger.des: Attack damage increased and attacks may stun underground.
Craft a decorative pommel, it provides a small amount of durability but has no functional value.
tetra.improvement.shared_handle/decorati: Provides a small amount of durability
tetra.improvement.basic_handle/decorativ: Provides a small amount of durability
tetra.improvement.long_handle/decorative: Provides a small amount of durability
tetra.improvement.light_handle/decorativ: Provides a small amount of durability
tetra.improvement.glaive/tempered.name: Tempered
tetra.improvement.glaive/serrated.name: Serrated
Hone the potency of the excavator effect, increasing the amount of blocks it breaks.
Further hone the potency of the excavator effect, increasing the amount of blocks it breaks.
Further hone the potency of the excavator effect, increasing the amount of blocks it breaks.
Further hone the potency of the excavator effect, increasing the amount of blocks it breaks.
Further hone the potency of the excavator effect, increasing the amount of blocks it breaks.
tetra.improvement.excavator_hone/potency: Increases the amount of blocks broken by the excavator effect
tetra/schematic/soot.name: Sooted
tetra/schematic/soot.description: Cover the handle in soot. Purely decorative, makes the handle look like netherite tool handles.
tetra/schematic/sword/soot.name: Sooted
tetra/schematic/sword/soot.description: Cover the hilt in soot. Purely decorative, makes the handle look like netherite tool handles.
tetra/schematic/bow/riot_stave.name: Riot Stave
tetra/schematic/bow/riot_stave.descripti: Replaces the stave with a riot stave crafted from the given materials. Riot staves offer bonus protection, but the extra armour makes the bow slower to draw.
tetra.module.bow/riot_stave.name: Riot Stave
tetra.module.bow/riot_stave.description: A Riot stave. Riot bows offer bonus protection, but the extra armour makes the bow slower to draw.
tetra/schematic/double/curved_handle/cur: Replace the handle for the head. The curve in the handle allows for the ability to throw the tool, but it makes it harder to use normally.
tetra.module.double/curved_handle.name: Curved Handle
tetra.module.double/curved_handle.descri: A curved tool handle. Handles are the primary source of integrity for tools. The curve in the handle allows for the ability to throw the tool, but it makes it harder to use normally.
tetra/schematic/single/scythe.name: Scythe
tetra/schematic/single/scythe.descriptio:
Craft a scythe head from the given material, which can cut down plants in a large area.

Works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra.module.single/scythe.name: Scythe
tetra.module.single/scythe.description:
A long and acrched scythe which can cut down plants in a large area.

Works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra/schematic/single/excavator/excavat: Craft a excavator head from the given material, which can mine multiple blocks of soft material at once.
tetra.module.single/excavator.name: Excavator
tetra.module.single/excavator.descriptio: A larger shovel head capable of mining multiple blocks at once.
tetra/schematic/single/glaive/glaive.des: Craft a glaive blade from the given material, which is a stronger and heavier polearm blade.
tetra.module.single/glaive.name: Glaive Blade
tetra.module.single/glaive.description: A strong and heavy polarm blade, which is used as a heavy weapon.
tetra/schematic/sword/katana_blade.name: Katana Blade
tetra/schematic/sword/katana_blade.descr: Replace the current sword blade with a long but lightweight blade with good sweeping ablity.
tetra.module.sword/katana_blade.name: Katana
tetra.module.sword/katana_blade.descript: A long but lightweight blade with good sweeping ablity.
